reviewtext: Only gave this four stars because it's only supporting a 32" TV. I think I would be scared to mount a 55" TV on it. If you sprang for a 50" or bigger TV, spend a little more on a properly rated mount. As with any TV mount, make sure you're hitting wall studs with the main screws, don't just use anchors in drywall or you're asking for trouble. LOTS of hardware included in the kit, so mounting any style or brand of TV shouldn't be a problem.
